=============
autoadsorbate
=============


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/autoadsorbate.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/autoadsorbate

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/fakoed/autoadsorbate.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.com/fakoed/autoadsorbate

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/autoadsorbate/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://autoadsorbatebasf.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?version=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




A heuristic approach of generating molecules and intermediates for at heterogeneous interfaces.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://autoadsorbate.readthedocs.io.
